channel.title: Game crashes during final boss fight
channel.description: Hey, guys! Great game, thank you very much! Enjoyed every level, and all of them were working just fine UNTIL the very fight with Nihilanth. I was about to finish him off when the game decided to "NOPE" me and crashed. I tried again several times and the issue was still there. That just couldn't be more frustrating! Download crash files from google drive (as i couldn't attach them directly to this post) https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Srgt4kJrQpKpyN9QYX6g6DPMCnqtaTFo/view?usp=sharing

item.title: Game crashes during final boss fight
item.dc:creator: antivrus
item.description:
Hey, guys! Great game, thank you very much! Enjoyed every level, and all of them were working just fine UNTIL the very fight with Nihilanth. I was about to finish him off when the game decided to “NOPE” me and crashed. I tried again several times and the issue was still there. That just couldn’t be more frustrating! Download crash files from google drive (as i couldn’t attach them directly to this post) https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Srgt4kJrQpKpyN9QYX6g6DPMCnqtaTFo/view?usp=sharing

Read full topic
item.source: Game crashes during final boss fight
